name: Detect Nothing
description:
Work against the clock (hidden) to find and destroy the canister in the department store.

Use the left stick on a game pad or the keyboard (wasd/arrow keys) to move around.  Press the space button to search where you are facing (a on a gamepad).  Once you find the canister, place a charge (ctrl on the keyboard or r1 on the gamepad) and get back to the entrance before time runs out.

CHANGELOG:

Fixed a small animation bug brought to my attention as well as a node reference that was throwing an error.  No new features were added but screen transitions may work better due to the node reference.
